21 class TreeHelper{
22 
23 public:
24  std::string robot_desc_string;
25  KDL::Tree kdlTree;
26  // Get KDL::Tree from parameter server
27  TreeHelper(ros::NodeHandle &n){
28  n.param("robot_description", robot_desc_string, std::string());
29  get_kdl_string();
30 
31  }
32 
33  bool get_kdl_string(){
34  if (!kdl_parser::treeFromString(robot_desc_string, kdlTree)){
35  ROS_ERROR("Failed to construct kdl tree");
36  return false;
37  }
38  return true;
39  }
40 
41  bool compute_jacobian(ros_robotic_skin::getJacobian::Request& req,
42  ros_robotic_skin::getJacobian::Response& res){
43  // Select the end effector and get the chain from base (panda_link0) to selected end effector
44  KDL::Chain kdlChain;
45  kdlTree.getChain("panda_link0", req.end_effector_name, kdlChain);
46  int number_joints = kdlChain.getNrOfJoints();
47 
48  // Current joint positions
49  KDL::JntArray jointAngles = KDL::JntArray(number_joints);
50  for (int i = 0; i < number_joints; i++)
51  jointAngles(i) = req.joint_states[i+2];
52 
53  // Compute jacobian
54  KDL::ChainJntToJacSolver JSolver = KDL::ChainJntToJacSolver(kdlChain); //OUT
55  KDL::Jacobian J;
56  J.resize(number_joints);
57  JSolver.JntToJac(jointAngles, J);
58 
59  // Get jacobian in list form
60  std::vector <double> J_vector;
61  for (unsigned int i = 0 ; i < 6 ; i++)
62  {
63  for (unsigned int j = 0 ; j < number_joints ; j++)
64  J_vector.push_back(J(i,j));
65  }
66 
67  res.J.end_effector_name = req.end_effector_name;
68  res.J.rows = 6;
69  res.J.columns = number_joints;
70  res.J.J = J_vector;
71 
72  return true;
73  }
74 };
75 
76 int main(int argc, char** argv)
77 {
78  ros::init(argc, argv, "KDL_server");
79  ros::NodeHandle n;
80  TreeHelper my_tree(n);
81 
82  ros::ServiceServer service = n.advertiseService("get_jacobian", &TreeHelper::compute_jacobian, &my_tree);
83  ROS_INFO("Ready to compute Jacobian");
84  ros::spin();
85 
86  return 0;
